translations: n．顽童，流浪儿童：街头流浪的、贫穷的、狡猾的儿童。
· The gamins were playing in the streets.

sentences.sentence: Champ Clark was discussing the gamins of the cities with an English visitor. The latter expatiated on the wit of the London type of the genius.
sentences.translation: 钱普普·克拉克正和一个来访的英国人讨论城市的流浪儿，英国人详细地叙述着伦敦式天才的机智。
